greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A141803.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(5) = 8 since row 5 of triangle A141803 = (1 + 2 + 3 + 2 + 0).
mathematica: Table[Total@Table[Mod[Total@IntegerDigits[n - i, i], i], {i, n - 1, 2, -1}], {n, 3, 60}] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Jun 18 2018 *)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 06 2008
